hymn.title: Lord Jesus, I love You, You're my all

layout.singingstanza: Lord Je -- sus, I love You. You're my all— You're my all in all. You gave me life in -- deed; You're all I need, You're all I need. Real peace and joy I nev -- er knew, Un -- til in spir -- it I touched You, so— Lord, I just o -- pen up to You; I let You do what You want to do. Lord, I just give my -- self to You, 'Cause I love You— Lord, I do. You save me all day long; Though I'm weak, You're so strong. The flow of life and peace With -- in me shows the way, Hour by hour, day by day; And if through weak -- ness I should fall, You al -- ways save me when I call, so— Lord, I just o -- pen up to You; I let You do what You want to do. Lord, I just give my -- self to You, 'Cause I love You— Lord, I do. O Lord, one touch with Thee Brought life in -- to me. And now I can't live with -- out You. You're my on -- ly de -- light— You've made ev -- ery -- thing right With a love that con -- strains me Till I say that— Lord, I just o -- pen up to You; I let You do what You want to do. Lord, I just give my -- self to You, 'Cause I love You— Lord, I do. You're my lov -- er— You're my all.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, I just open up to You; I let You do what You want to do. Lord, I just give myself to You, 'Cause I love You—Lord, I do.

O Lord, one touch with Thee Brought life into me. And now I can't live without You. You're my only delight— You've made everything right With a love that constrains me Till I say that— (Repeat Chorus) You're my lover—You're my all.
